page.title: 15POLICE IN CALLANDER
page.content: There are 8 men in the Callander Police Force-6 constables and 2 sergeants.They cover a wide area of Central Region,including small towns and villages.One car and Landrover are used.They do not use dogs but when they are needed,they are brought from Srirling. They attend accidents and are involved in{Mountain Rescue. Visiting farms to ensure that sheep are dipped is also part of their job. There are a few hundred{crimes} committed every year,the most common being the break-in of cars. The men are usually on {foot patrol} and last year 3 men were injured on duty. Tourists cause many of the problems.
